alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:00PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow and strong winds expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 3 to 6 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Arco/Mud Lake Desert, Beaverhead/Lemhi Highlands, Lost River Valley/Range, Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys, Frank Church Wilderness, and Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin, including but not limited to Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon NM, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, Small, Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Borah Peak, Challis, Clayton, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
